laboratory_examinations.findings: Elevated WBC count; specific measurement not provided.
Distended GB with stones and sludge, borderline GB wall thickening, mild pericholecystic fluid.

New opacification of the right lung base with moderate right pleural effusion. Blunting of the left costophrenic angle with a small left pleural effusion. Streaky opacification of the left lung base likely reflects atelectasis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Compared to the remote prior study, new findings of opacification and pleural effusions observed.
